name: List Trainer Skills
description: Use this function to list the skills that a NPC can train the player in.

list_trainer_skills_mode.description: List of all available skills that the NPC can train the player in.

system_prompt_info: `{GPT_func_name}` if requested to list the skills that a NPC can train the player in.
llm_feedback: {speakerName} is about to give a list of the skills they can train the player in: {llm_output_mode} at {playerName}'s request. List the skills in first person in natural conversation. {speakerName} will complete this action to the best of their ability and find a rationalization for the action if needed.
veto_warning: {speakerName} is about to give a list of the skills they can train the player in: {llm_output_mode} at {playerName}'s request. List the skills in first person in natural conversation. Begin your response with <veto> if {speakerName} would refuse to do so then explain in first person in character why.
